targetId.title: targetId
targetId.description: Ensembl gene ID for the gene product.

datasourceId.title: Datasourceid
datasourceId.description: Identifier of the data source providing the expression data.

datatypeId.title: Datatypeid
datatypeId.description: Identifier of the data type, e.g. RNA-seq, microarray.

tissueBiosampleId.title: Tissuebiosampleid
tissueBiosampleId.description: Identifier of the tissue or biosample from which the expression data was derived.

celltypeBiosampleId.title: Celltypebiosampleid
celltypeBiosampleId.description: Identifier of the cell type from which the expression data was derived.

targetFromSource.title: Targetfromsource
targetFromSource.description: Identifier of the target gene product from the data source, if different from geneProductId e.g. Gene symbol or Uniprot ID.

tissueBiosampleFromSource.title: Tissuebiosamplefromsource
tissueBiosampleFromSource.description: Identifier of the tissue or biosample from the data source, , as defined by the source data. Can also be a comma separated list of tissue names aggregated in single-cell data.

celltypeBiosampleFromSource.title: Celltypebiosamplefromsource
celltypeBiosampleFromSource.description: Identifier of the cell type from the data source, as defined by the source data. Can also be a comma separated list of cell type names aggregated in single-cell data.

nSamples.title: NSamples
nSamples.description: Number of samples used to calculate the expression values.

nCells.title: NCells
nCells.description: Number of cells used to calculate the expression values, applicable for single-cell data only.

genders.description: List of genders for each sample.

ages.description: List of age ranges for each sample.

min.title: Min
min.description: Minimum value in the assay group.

q1.title: Q1
q1.description: First quantile of values in the assay group.

q2.title: Q2
q2.description: Median of values in the assay group.

q3.title: Q3
q3.description: third quantile of values in the assay group.

max.title: Max
max.description: Maximum expression value in the assay group.
